column4: That was what I was confused about, b/c flash goes through pulse
pastebinit
!help | lefty_
Press 'e' and add noapic to the end of the 'linux' line.
yes
make sure there is a space
I remember when I forgot once... and screwed up my boots
at the end of the line that starts with linux
any ideas?
after you successfully boot, do this
nano /etc/default/grub
go to the GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_default line, and add 'noapic' (without quotes) to the end, with a space, before the double quotes
and there should be a sudo in front of the nano
you are still in the live install cd
that will only chage the live install settings, not the installation settings
wait. I will go type this all up on pastebin
pastebin.com/D4Vf5vgw
you can check it on the livecd, but it will not apply to your install
your welcome :)
we are all here to help after all :)
night all
nooooooooooooooooo. lol
